name: Shin Galaxy - Engage
description:
GAMEPLAY

SURVIVING

During gameplay, the player must survive as long as possible, destroying enemies ahead and collecting resources to improve their chance of survival. There will be no rogue element in the game everything you collect will not be lost. As time on the map increases new enemies will appear. Also, it is possible to increase the enemy's attributes through modifiers, increasing the difficulty and the loot obtained.

The game starts with the ships of the Drone class unlocked and with 01 available map to be played, being able to unlock others when a certain requirement is fulfilled.

Each map will have its own enemies and random events can occur. To unlock a map a certain requirement needs to be fulfilled in the previous map.



MISSIONS

There are missions that can be completed to earn rewards being crystals, CPUs, or even skins to customize your spaceships.




IMPROVING YOUR SPACESHIPS

The game has 06 unique ships and each ship will have 03 classes, they are:

Drone => Class 01 => Class 02.

To unlock the later class, the player needs to fully upgrade the antecedent class. In the Hangar, it is possible to level up the ship with crystals, which are collected by destroying enemies. In addition, each ship has a passive which allows different types of builds.



Each ship has 08 attributes that can be improved in the Hangar, they are:

- Attack
- Elemental Attack
- Speed
- Fire Rate
- Bomb Capacity
- Bomb Fire Rate
- Laser Cannons
- Life

CPUs

CPUs are equippable resources on the ship and there are 03 types of CPU:

Attributes: Improves the basic attributes of the ship.

Passives: Enables combat passives on the ship

Specials: Modifies or enables special features on the ship

CPUs are collected by destroying enemies and their rarity ranges from Common to Legendary. A slot is required to equip it and each ship class has a permanent number of slots.



So pilot, let's survive the dangers of Shin Galaxy.
